function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personal hygiene practices on jobsite","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among workers","Mitigation":"Implement regular hand washing, disinfection of equipment, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"Hand sanitizers, disinfectants, disposable gloves","People":"Construction workers","Owner":"Construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing measures on jobsite","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread among workers","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing, limit sharing of tools and equipment, and discourage stacking of workforce trades","Technologies":"Communication technology for virtual meetings, signage for distancing reminders","People":"Construction workers","Owner":"Construction companies"},{"Description":"Lack of management of sick employees","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the disease within the workplace","Mitigation":"Implement a protocol for sick employees, provide access to testing, and require sick employees to leave the jobsite","Technologies":"Health screening tools, access to testing facilities","People":"Construction workers, management","Owner":"Construction companies"}]}
